t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    line = input()
    words = line.split()
    nums = [int(w) for w in words]
    c = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            num = nums[i] * nums[j]
            string = str(num)
            digit = [int(s) for s in string]
            d = sum(digit)
            if d > c:
                c = d
    print(c)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    a = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = sorted(b)
    L = []
    for i in range(a):
        for j in range(i + 1, a):
            d = 0
            c = x[i] * x[j]
            c = str(c)
            for k in c:
                d = d + int(k)
                L.append(d)
    print(max(L))

t = int(input())
for x in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    list = []
    final = 0
    num = input()
    li = num.split(' ')
    list = [int(x) for x in li]
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            sum = 0
            pro = str(list[i] * list[j])
            for z in pro:
                sum = sum + int(z)
            if sum > final:
                final = sum
    print(final)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = []
    for j in range(len(a)):
        for k in range(j + 1, len(a)):
            z = a[j] * a[k]
            s = str(z)
            sum = 0
            for p in s:
                sum = sum + int(p)
            l.append(sum)
    print(max(l))

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    r = int(input())
    t = []
    gr = 0
    t = [int(a) for a in input().split()]
    for l in range(len(t)):
        for m in range(l + 1, len(t)):
            s1 = 0
            r = t[l] * t[m]
            while r > 0:
                d = r % 10
                s1 += d
                r = r // 10
            if s1 >= gr:
                gr = s1
    print(gr)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    m = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    x = [sum([int(i) for i in str(m[i] * m[j]).strip()]) for i in range(n) for j in range(i + 1, n)]
    print(max(x))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = []
    for i in range(0, n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            pro = a[i] * a[j]
            maxsum = 0
            while pro != 0:
                maxsum = maxsum + pro % 10
                l.append(maxsum)
                pro = pro // 10
    print(max(l))

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    d = []
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            p = A[i] * A[j]
            s = 0
            while p > 0:
                s += p % 10
                p //= 10
            d.append(s)
    print(max(d))

from itertools import combinations
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    comb = combinations(arr, 2)
    pqr = []
    for i in comb:
        abc = 1
        for j in i:
            abc *= j
        pqr.append(abc)
    s = []
    for i in set(pqr):
        x = list(str(i))
        ans = 0
        for j in x:
            ans += int(j)
        s.append(ans)
    print(max(s))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = []
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            c = a[i] * a[j]
            s = 0
            while c > 0:
                r = c % 10
                c = c // 10
                s = s + r
            b.append(s)
    print(max(b))

n = int(input())
while n != 0:
    lst = []
    mul = []
    a = int(input())
    my_list = input().split()
    lst = [int(item) for item in my_list]
    for i in range(0, a):
        for j in range(i + 1, a):
            mul.append(lst[i] * lst[j])
    max = 0
    for i in mul:
        p = 0
        j = i
        while j != 0:
            p = p + j % 10
            j //= 10
        if p > max:
            max = p
    print(max)
    n -= 1

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    d = []
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(i + 1, N):
            p = l[i] * l[j]
            s = 0
            while p > 0:
                s += p % 10

            d.append(s)
    print(max(d))

from itertools import combinations
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    comb = combinations(arr, 2)
    pqr = []
    for i in comb:
        abc = 1
        for j in i:
            abc *= j
        pqr.append(abc)
    s = []
    for i in set(pqr):
        x = list(str(i))
        ans = 0
        for j in x:
            ans += int(j)
        s.append(ans)
    print(max(s))

a = int(input())
while a > 0:
    a = a - 1
    size = int(input())
    lst = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    outlst = []
    for i in range(size):
        for j in range(i + 1, size):
            mul = lst[i] * lst[j]
            sum_b = 0
            while mul > 0:
                sum_b = sum_b + mul % 10
                mul = mul // 10
            outlst.append(sum_b)
    outlst.sort()
    indx = len(outlst)
    out_val = outlst[indx - 1]
    print(out_val)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    p = []
    for i in range(0, n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            x = a[i] * a[j]
            p.append(x)
        for j in range(0, i):
            x = a[i] * a[j]
            p.append(x)
    g = []
    for i in p:
        sum = 0
        while i != 0:
            r = i % 10
            i = i // 10
            sum = sum + r
            g.append(sum)
    x = max(g)
    print(x)
    t = t - 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    product = []
    for i in range(0, n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            p = x[i] * x[j]
            product.append(p)
        for j in range(0, i):
            p = x[i] * x[j]
            product.append(p)
    great = []
    for i in product:
        sum = 0
        while i != 0:
            rem = i % 10
            i = i // 10
            sum = sum + rem
            great.append(sum)
    ans = max(great)
    print(ans)

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = []
    c = []
    d = []
    for i in range(len(a)):
        for j in range(i + 1, len(a)):
            k = a[i] * a[j]
            c.append(k)
    for i in c:
        sum = 0
        while i > 0:
            res = i % 10
            sum = sum + res
            i = i // 10
        d.append(sum)
    print(max(d))
